name: Jump 'n Twist 'n Geometry Switch
description:
The most addictive finger tap game ever, seriously! Enjoy hours of casual fun in Jump 'n Twist 'n Geometry Switch. Jump your ball on the platforms for as long as you can as the platforms twist. Don't fall down the gaps or its game over. Time your jump with each turn and beat your high score; so satisfying when you do :)

Players who love easy to play but hard to master games will love this. Anyone can play, just tap to jump, its that simple.

If you want an addictive casual experience that you can jump in to quickly and play, then this is perfect for you. Download it now and beat that high score.

Happy Jumping
